title: Telephony Signalling Transport over Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) Applicability Statement
abstract:
This document describes the applicability of the several protocols
developed under the signalling transport framework.  A
description of the main issues regarding the use of the Stream Control
Transmission Protocol (SCTP) and an explanation of each adaptation layer for
transport of telephony signalling information over IP infrastructure
are given.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
